About.main-paragraph: I'm Lea! I'm a web developer who loves front-end but who is not afraid to go and check the back-end. I used to organise cultural and artistic projects, but to find a job that really fits me, I've decided to add a string to my bow... and here I am! I have always been interested in the web and being a developer allows me to combine this passion, my rigour, my creativity and my desire to learn something new everyday.
About.second-paragraph-displaynone: I'm looking for a front-end position in a dynamic environment where I'll be able to fully get involved in my missions. I am really keen to make the web more beautiful and improve the user experience. Don't hesitate to contact me!
About.second-paragraph: Don't hesitate to contact me ! We will find together the best solution to realise your project.

Project1.title: Archipel Contact
Project1.description: Complete redesign and restructuring of the website. Archipel Contact is an incoming agency specialised in tailored trips to Indonesia.

Project2.title: Daily Orsay
Project2.description: WIP - This is a little project that uses the RMN-GP API - a group of French museums. The website displays new artworks everyday, which are part of the Orsay Museum's collection. Click and discover a painting, a sculpture and a photograph !

Project3.title: Portfolio
Project3.description: This is where you are right now! My portefolio will evolve through time with new projects... and I will improve it with my everyday learning.

Project4.title: Find My Art
Project4.description: Find My Art is the final group project made during my professional training. It is an online art library. Just like a library but for art! Users can connect to their account and rent the artworks they want in the website's collection for a limited amount of time.

Project5.title: Marileme
Project5.description: Creation of a e-shop website for Creantec's new luxury decoration brand, Marileme.

Project6.title: Les Grands Espaces
Project6.description: Complete redesign and restructuring of the website Les Grands Espaces, a non-profit organisation specialised in film education

Project7.title: The ProCATination Game
Project7.description: Play 'rock-paper-scissors' against a cat. If you win, you will have the right to procrastinate...maybe.

Project8.title: KARABA F.C.
Project8.description: Creation and monthly updates of KARABA F.C band's website
